程序包 org.giiwa.cache

类 Cache

java.lang.Object
org.giiwa.cache.Cache
public final class Cache extends Object
The Cache Class Cache used for cache object, the cache was grouped by cluster
configuration in giiwa.properties 
 cache.url=memcached://host:port
 cache.group=demo
作者:
joe

  • 方法详细资料

    • init

      public static void init(String url, String user, String pwd)
      initialize the cache with configuration.
      参数:
      url - the configuration that includes cache configure ("cache.url")

    • get

      public static <T> T get(String id)
      Gets the object by id, if the object was expired, null return.
      类型参数:
      T - the class
      参数:
      id - the id of object in cache system
      返回:
      Object if the object not presented or expired, will return null

    • remove

      public static boolean remove(String id)
      Removes the cached object by id.
      参数:
      id - the object id in cache
      返回:
      true, if successful

    • set

      public static boolean set(String id, Object data)
      cache the object with the id, if exists, then update it, otherwise create new in cache.
      参数:
      id - the id of the object
      data - the object
      返回:
      true, if successful

    • set

      public static boolean set(String id, Object data, long expired)
      cache the object with the id, if exists, then update it, otherwise create new in cache.
      参数:
      id - the id of the object
      data - the object
      expired - , the expired time
      返回:
      true, if successful

    • setBigdata

      public static boolean setBigdata(String id, Object data)
      set the data which exceed 1M
      参数:
      id -
      data -
      返回:

    • getBigdata

      public static <T> T getBigdata(String id)
      get the data which exceed 1M
      参数:
      id -
      返回:
      the object

    • trylock

      public static boolean trylock(String name)
      trying lock the name with the value, will expired by expire
      参数:
      name -
      value -
      expire -
      返回:
